meanings.definition: A person who helps or supports another person, especially in a social or romantic context.
meanings.sent1: My wingmen always have my back when I need them.
meanings.sent2: She relied on her wingmen to give her advice on the date.
meanings.sent3: At the party, my wingmen made sure I didn't spill my drink on anyone.
meanings.sent4: In the game of love, having trustworthy wingmen is like having a secret weapon.
meanings.sent5: Having loyal wingmen by your side can make any situation easier to handle.

meanings.definition: A member of a military unit who supports and assists another member during a mission or operation.
meanings.sent1: The wingmen covered their fellow soldier as they advanced.
meanings.sent2: The pilot trusted his wingmen to watch for enemy aircraft.
meanings.sent3: During the training exercise, the wingmen played a crucial role in the success of the mission.
meanings.sent4: The bond between wingmen in combat is unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The wingmen flew in formation, ready to protect each other at all costs.
